name: Birds Trip
description:
Birds Trip is a shoot'em up game... without shooting!

As automn is coming, find your way through the level, avoiding clouds and mountains. Gather back your lost companions, switch between formations and do your best to lead as many birds as you can to warmer skies.

Birds trip is a game made for the #CozyAutumnGameJam2022 by a team of four within 10 days.

  : Move

  : Accelerate

 : Pause

 : Change birds formation

  • Amélie REYNAUD (Game Design, Development, Tests)
  • Bcraft128 (Game Design, Development, Sound Design, Tests)
  • Roland LÉ (Original Idea, Game Design, Development, Graphics, Tests)
  • Vox (Game Design, UX/UI Design, Level Design, Tests)
